original_text: Then the chief of the fathers and princes of the tribes of Israel and the captains of thousands and of hundreds, with the rulers of the king's work, offered willingly,
korean_text: 이에 모든 가문의 지도자들과 이스라엘 모든 지파의 지도자들과 천부장과 백부장과 왕의 사무관이 다 즐거이 드리되

sentences.original_text: Then the chief of the fathers
and princes of the tribes of Israel
and captains of thousands and of hundreds
with the rulers of the king's work
